name: Repossession
description:
Repossession is a 2D Action-Packed Shooter, with both Team Based Co-Op (Not Implemented), and Deathmatch. - Either fighting their way through missions, robbing bank after bank or with each other. (soon) - they descend through Chaos for a Big Earnings and pay off the remaining debt.

Note in Deathmatch Currently - You die in one hit, so don't.

Multiple Weapons


In case of a fight breaks out, and when your Primary is out of Ammo, Switching to your secondary is faster than reloading.

Design your Loadout against Foe


Everyone has a playstyle they enjoy, with a Inventory System, we allow for more Hectic Gameplay suited towards the player. With many more weapons soon to come.

Invite the Family, no really...


I forgot to set a limit on the max player count so its a feature!

Tight Gunplay


Backstory:
Washington 1990s, The Player used to own a quiet bakery in town, the bakery was nice and all but it was heavily in debt, The local gang came and threatened the Player if he couldn't pay in back in time. The Player much to his dismay, was running out of time, then with no choice was forced to take on Crime in order to pay the money back.

Main Story:
The Player first started out with petty theft, and holding a few places up. The Player soon finds out its not enough to pay it back, he would need to do bigger and bigger jobs. This is where the player starts, Will you the player get out of debt in time, or pay the price.

Features
    [One Gamemode - Deathmatch]
    [Two Maps - One for Testing (don't use that one, matter of fact, I disabled it.)]
    [Multiplayer Lobbies]
    [Three Weapons - Pistol, Mp5, M4]
    [Working Health System, and Current Ammo And Max Ammo]
    [Experience a Outdoor Section and a Indoor Sections, for close compact gunplay, or for Long Distance Shooting.]
    [Fully Supported Quit Button on the Main Menu..]
    [Many More to Come.]

Planned Features
    [More than one Gamemode - Heisting]
    [More than three Weapons - Snipers, Pistols, Melees, etc]
